subject: p10268877
raw_find: Indwelling support and monitoring devices are unchanged in position, and cardiomediastinal contours are stable allowing for positional differences. Left retrocardiac atelectasis has improved, but an area of confluent increased opacity in the right infrahilar region is new. The latter may reflect atelectasis, aspiration, or developing infection.
Findings: Indwelling support and monitoring devices are unchanged in position, and cardiomediastinal contours are stable allowing for positional differences. Left retrocardiac atelectasis has improved, but an area of confluent increased opacity in the right infrahilar region is new. The latter may reflect atelectasis, aspiration, or developing infection.
